text: ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei shi tiandi de zhu?” Ni shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni shuo:“Nandao nimen hai yao she ta er ba naxie buneng wei ziji zhangguan fu huo de [ouxiang] dang baohu zhe [chongbai] ma?” Ni shuo:“Xiazi he neng jian zhe shi yiyang de ma? Hei'an he guangming shi yiyang de ma? Nandao tamen gei an la shezhi de huobanmen neng xiang ta [an la] nayang chuangzao wanwu, yizhi tamen fenbian bu chu liang zhe de chuangzao ma?” Ni shuo:“An la shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe. Ta shi du yi de, wanneng de [zhu].”
